The admin reused one prime while generating RSA keys for two encrypted messages. Recover both messages: 140667832746798091708674625072510486052160038618169099061486554475333405206841996738299098464866454471828511348365117171026441641402578134740466722297745175948493380502353895884089777773240939136853315242225241111179188439914788023

The flag format is flag{...}
n=504402595051520600270679873555709713312041246913824897826423246683230006453427784271073497588810475278239825520325693712435428827898495630076591092377082266337789960717652027088265650498792418276660785993183958436673928125054514569, e=322754316273131504645690152122898913161897116559544221344118845109125138885706921061026452624133063869875848992370577700173949167167705201924138983040278620465214787614839573085858768849357912545217619541287336972879889223630467621

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{hd6lc8jh}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 140667832746798091708674625072510486052160038618169099061486554475333405206841996738299098464866454471828511348365117171026441641402578134740466722297745175948493380502353895884089777773240939136853315242225241111179188439914788023
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=504402595051520600270679873555709713312041246913824897826423246683230006453427784271073497588810475278239825520325693712435428827898495630076591092377082266337789960717652027088265650498792418276660785993183958436673928125054514569, e=322754316273131504645690152122898913161897116559544221344118845109125138885706921061026452624133063869875848992370577700173949167167705201924138983040278620465214787614839573085858768849357912545217619541287336972879889223630467621
extra_info: p=22458909035202947726254920596059969551531121191953845186730559134821994008581684156672324534446256724788899415611837, q=22458909035202947726254920596059969551531121191953845186730559134821994008581684156672324534446256724788899415611837, Ï†(n)=504402595051520600270679873555709713312041246913824897826423246683230006453427784271073497588810475278239825520325648794617358422003043120235398972437979204095406053027278565969996006510775254908347441344115065923224350326223290896
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
